participant_1.background:
I am a well-educated person who enjoys bowling and music.
i like to hunt for my food.
I'm taking my child to the zoo to see koalas.
I binge watch shows on streaming services to escape my unsatisfying relationship.
My laundry takes a backseat to my many projects.

participant_2.background:
My black and white cat, Cow, is my most valued material possession because he is my best friend and always there for me.
I grew up in a small town in the Midwest, but I'm ready for a change.
I'm afraid of crashing my model airplane.
I am not close with my parents.
I'm going to the gym to lift weights, eat some healthy food, and then watch Magic Mike.

content.text: Hey there! I'm going to the zoo to see koalas with my kid! How are you doing today?
Hello! That sounds fun. I'm going to the gym to lift weights, eat some healthy food, and then watch Magic Mike. How's your child?
They're doing good! They're really excited to see the koalas. Do you like animals?
I love animals! I have a black and white cat named Cow and he's my best friend.
Aw, that's so sweet! My favorite animal is the elephant.
Elephants are amazing! They're so smart and social.
I know! I'd love to see one in real life.
Maybe you can go to the zoo with your kid!
That's a great idea! We'll have to check it out.
Sounds like a plan! Have a great day!
